name: Congressman Tim Ryan
tweet_text: As a proud beneficiary of the labor movement, I will always stand in solidarity with our workers who are courageously paving the way for a better future in the workplace. And I'm proud to fight for them every day in Congress.

name: Congressman Tim Ryan
tweet_text: I love telling that story because it gets to the heart of the matter. My grandpa didn't know what the terms of that contract were, whether those workers were bargaining over better pay or better working conditions, but what he did know: We always stood on the side of the workers.

name: Congressman Tim Ryan
tweet_text: Younger and a little less patient than I am today, I suggested we go to the perfectly fine market right next to us. Without hesitation, my grandpa says, "No, we can't go there. The meat cutters are on strike. And we ain't crossing that picket line."

name: Congressman Tim Ryan
tweet_text: One day, I was driving him around, and like usual, we stopped at just about every store in town to make sure he got the right groceries from the right places. And at a certain point, already hours into this thing, he tells me we've got to drive to yet another shop miles away.

name: Congressman Tim Ryan
tweet_text: Toward the end of my grandfather's life, I used to help with his grocery shopping. I don't know how your grandparents shop, but my grandfather, who was Italian, turned it into an art form. He used to make multiple stops all over town to make sure he was getting the best deals.

name: Congressman Tim Ryan
tweet_text:
As workers across the country demonstrate their collective power to fight for better workplace conditions, I'm reminded of one of the greatest lessons my grandfather, a life-long union member, taught me: Never cross the picket line.

https://t.co/vG0cb0u3mw
